method.name: getProximity
method.description: For the agent to get the proximity of this entity. Returns a percentage, where 0% means "this object is very far from destination" and 100% means "this entity is very close to destination".

method.name: isAccessible
method.description: Returns true if this object, according to its accessibility level, should be considered as being accessible by the agent, false otherwise.

method.name: reachIt
method.description: For the agent to enact the decision to move towards this object, along some path. Returns true once the agent has reached the end-point of the path (please note that this end-point may be distinct from the target position to reach).

argument.name: pathType
argument.description: The path type used by the agent to reach the given destination.

method.name: isReached
method.description: Returns 'true' if the Crowd has entirely reached this element (the crowd has no more flow, and it is not moving anymore), 'false' otherwise.
